channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17037] Enhance LoadIncrementalHFiles API to convey loaded files
item.description:
When Map<byte[], List<Path>> is passed to LoadIncrementalHFiles, we should provide a means for the caller to get the collection of Paths for the loaded hfiles.

The functionality added by HBASE-16821 is preserved as shown by the modified TestLoadIncrementalHFiles#testSimpleLoadWithMap
item.summary: Enhance LoadIncrementalHFiles API to convey loaded files

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
